innerPoint.describe: When you utilize our services or create an account, we may gather personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and billing details.
We also collect data related to the properties you list on our website, including details, photos, and availability.
Information about your interactions with our website, such as pages visited, search queries, and IP address.
Your personal information is used to facilitate various processes, including inquiries, bookings, and communication with other users.
We may use your data to tailor your experience, display relevant listings, and recommend customized content.
You might receive updates, newsletters, and promotional offers regarding our services, but you can opt out at any time.
User behavior and data are analyzed to improve our website's functionality, performance, and security.
If you engage in an inquiry, we may share pertinent transaction-related information.
Trusted third-party service providers may receive your information to aid in our website's operation and service delivery.
We may disclose your data to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal procedures, or enforceable governmental requests.

title: Data Security
describe: We employ industry-standard security measures to safeguard your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Nevertheless, complete security cannot be guaranteed for internet transmission or electronic storage.

title: Your Rights
describe: You possess the rights to access, update, or delete your personal data. You can also manage your communication preferences and opt out of marketing communications. Should you wish to exercise these rights or have privacy concerns, please contact us.

title: Third-Party Websites
describe: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
describe: This Privacy Policy may be periodically updated to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of significant updates through prominent notices on our website.
